name: Squareflex
description:
Fast paced arcade tapping game. Tap the white squares before they fade out, blue squares for bonus points.... Be careful though, they are fast, AND don't forget - DO NOT touch the red!! Can you get the ultimate high score?

Want to tap down on an image, someone's face or a picture of your choosing? Sure you can, with customisable white squares the options are endless!

Features
- Two modes. Endless & Time Attack
- Simple controls
- Listen to your own music
- Leaderboards for both modes
- Customise your white squares

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/squareflex
Twitter: @squareflex
Graphics: Luke Sammut
Music: playonloop.com, noiseforfun.com
